channel.title: Version 7.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 7.0.0 (2024-10-15) Cap'n Hugo 0.126.0 0.126.0 This release requires a newer Cap'n Hugo version. Break'n Break'n This release comes wit' significant changes 'n file nam'n o' partials an' how th' theme works internally. This was done because th' theme
